alert.note: Alert for Grant; Owen (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 12 at 8:55AM EST by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF GRANT AND OWEN COUNTIES THROUGH 930 AM EST... At 855 AM EST, a strong thunderstorm was located 9 miles southwest of Owenton, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Williamstown, Dry Ridge, Owenton, Corinth, Worthville, Monterey, Gratz, Stewartsville, Elk Lake, Beechwood, Northcutt, Wheatley, Natlee, New Liberty, Camp Northward, New Columbus, Elmer Davis Lake, Harmony, Cherry Grove and Long Ridge. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a sturdy building. To report hazardous weather conditions, go to our website at weather.gov/iln and submit your report via social media, when you can do so safely.
